Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Neilian Drive, north of the Snake Eyes Gaming Facility.
Room.LongDescription: Gambling has never really been illegal in Oceancrest, but highly discouraged. Not so much because of the gambling itself, but what the loss of large amounts of money does to people. After all, the house always has an advantage, otherwise they wouldn't be doing it.
